name: Parthenium Weed Carriers - Record of Movement

elements.name: env
elements.label: env
elements.defaultValue: ENV

elements.name: PartheniumWeedCarrierRecordOfMovementHeading
elements.label: Parthenium Weed Carriers - Record of Movement

elements.name: IntroductionInfo
elements.label: IntroductionInfo
elements.defaultValue:
Operators of grain harvesting machinery (i.e. grain harvesters and combs/fronts) can use this form to register a Parthenium Weed Carriers - Record of Movement with the Department of Primary Industries and Regional Development (DPIRD) and be issued with a Carrier Biosecurity Certificate.

Grain harvesting machinery that has been used in Queensland is prohibited from entering NSW from Queensland under the NSW Biosecurity Act 2015, unless the operator has:

  • registered a Record of Movement with DPRID (using this form), AND
  • cleaned the machinery in a manner that is consistent with Schedule 1 of the Biosecurity Order (Permitted Activities) 2019, AND
  • presented the machinery for inspection at an approved facility.

Operators that meet these conditions will be issued with a Carrier Biosecurity Certificate and authorised to cross the border into NSW.

Brand-new unused harvesters and combs/fronts are exempt from having to register a Parthenium Weed Carriers - Record of Movement and hold a Carrier Biosecurity Certificate before entering NSW from Queensland.

This season the fee for the Biosecurity Certificate is $75, $75.30 to pay with card surcharge. Visa or Mastercard accepted. The charge is GST-free. A refund can be requested if the machinery is not presented for inspection. If you no longer require a carrier biosecurity certificate contact weeds@dprid.nsw.gov.au to request a refund.

Further details: Parthenium - our greatest threat.

elements.name: UserKeyInfo
elements.label: UserKeyInfo
elements.defaultValue: Required fields marked with

elements.name: FormPrivacyStatmentInfo
elements.label: FormPrivacyStatementInfo
elements.defaultValue:
When you complete a form on this website the Department of Primary Industries and Regional Development (DPIRD) will ask you to provide personal information (such as your name, email address and telephone number). This information will allow the department to trace the movements of grain harvesting machinery that has entered NSW from Queensland. The NSW destinations where that machinery is used will be inspected by an authorised officer for the presence of parthenium weed, at a future date.

You must provide this information, otherwise we are unable to issue a Parthenium Weed Carrier Biosecurity Certificate to you. We may use and disclose your information as is reasonably necessary for the purpose of performing biosecurity risk functions under, or reasonably contemplated by, the Biosecurity Act 2015. We will not otherwise disclose information about you to any person except where permitted by law. If you would like to gain access to, or amend your personal information, or require more details about privacy please contact us gipa@dpird.nsw.gov.au

Clicking on the 'submit' button on the form acts as your consent for us to collect the information you have provided. Before you submit this information, we will take reasonable steps to inform you of, where applicable, any law that requires the information to be collected and which fields are mandatory, and which are optional.

elements.name: VersionInfo
elements.label: VersionInfo
elements.defaultValue: v20240911-1715

elements.name: __helpDialogInfo
elements.label: __helpDialogInfo
elements.defaultValue:
Having trouble with this form?

Please email weeds@dpi.nsw.gov.au

elements.name: __receiptPageInfo
elements.label: __receiptPageInfo
elements.defaultValue:
If the "person responsible email" and/or "owner email" was supplied, a pdf copy of this Record of Movement and (if a payment is made) Tax Invoice/Receipt has been automatically emailed. This will contain the "reference code" below. So no need to copy in that case.

The [Download a PDF copy of your form] button and "Send yourself an email with a PDF copy for your records" text box below, only provide a copy of the Record of Movement.

elements.name: __receiptContactInfo
elements.label: __receiptContactInfo
elements.defaultValue: If you are have any questions please email weeds@dpi.nsw.gov.au

elements.name: IsInspectorFillingRom
elements.label: Are you a biosecurity certifier filling this record of movement form out on behalf of the person responsible?
elements.hint: A biosecurity certifier may be filling out this form: to provide assistance to the person responsible; or entering data after-the-fact (based on paper records of inspections past).

elements.name: InspectorFillingRom
elements.label: Biosecurity certifier filling record of movement
elements.hint: If this doesn't update with your name even after the "Biosecurity certifier code" lookup returns a green tick: your code was incorrect. In the field above, "Biosecurity certifier code", try your correct code, and click [Lookup].

elements.name: InspectorFillingRomClearNameInfo
elements.label: InspectorFillingRomClearNameInfo
elements.defaultValue:
If, after a [Lookup], you wish to clear the name returned to "Biosecurity certifier filling record of movement" then:

  • In "Biosecurity certifier code" clear all text; and
  • Click [Lookup] again.

elements.name: PersonResponsibleEmail
elements.label: Email
elements.hint: The Record of Movement and, after inspection, Biosecurity Certificate will be emailed to this address.

elements.name: EmailWarning
elements.label: PersonResponsibleEmailWarning
elements.defaultValue: An email is not required, but without it we can't issue you a digital (PDF) Record of Movement nor digital (PDF) Biosecurity Certificate.

elements.name: PersonResponsibleCanAccessEmailOnTheRoad
elements.label: Can you readily access your email from a mobile device, while on the road?
elements.hint: This season it is not required that you can access email while on the road. We are collecting information to improve processes for next season. The "Unknown" option is for biosecurity certifiers filling this form out based on prior paper based records.

elements.name: PersonResponsibleMobilePhone
elements.label: Mobile phone
elements.regexMessage: Must contain any of: digits; spaces; brackets "(", ")"; or a plus "+". Must be a minimum of 8 characters.

elements.name: PersonResponsibleAlternatePhone
elements.label: Alternate phone
elements.regexMessage: Must contain any of: digits; spaces; brackets "(", ")"; or a plus "+". Must be a minimum of 8 characters

elements.name: MovementDetailsWarning
elements.label: MovementDetailsWarning
elements.defaultValue:
All offices require 24 hours' notice of your intention to present machinery for inspection. To notify offices, ring and leave a message on the answering service. Machinery can only be inspected during daylight hours.

  • Boggabilla: Newell Highway, Boggabilla, NSW. (07) 4671 1227.
  • Currumbin: Currumbin Class Road, Currumbin Waters, QLD. 0429 185 136.
  • Hebel: Margaret Street, Hebel, QLD. (07) 4625 0916.
  • Mungindi: Carnarvon Highway, Mungindi, QLD. (02) 6753 2323.

elements.name: InspectionFacilityIntended
elements.label: Inspection facility intended
elements.hint: Optional. The inspection facility you intend to visit. At the inspection facility this helps the inspector find your Record of Movement in their system. You are free to go to a different inspection facility if plans change, without having to resubmit a new Record of Movement.

elements.name: ExpectedInspectionDateInfo
elements.label: ExpectedInspectionDateInfo
elements.defaultValue: Biosecurity Certifiers: for the 2023 season supply in "Expected inspection date" the Actual Inspection date.

elements.name: ExpectedInspectionDate
elements.label: Expected inspection date
elements.hint: This is the expected date of your attendance at a facility for inspection. Use the actual date if filling out at the facility on inspection day; or your best guess if filling out ahead of inspection.

elements.name: OwnerInfo
elements.label: OwnerInfo
elements.defaultValue: Only one owner per record of movement.

elements.name: OwnerEmail
elements.label: Email
elements.hint: The Record of Movement and, after inspection, Biosecurity Certificate will be emailed to this address.

elements.name: OwnerEmailWarning
elements.label: OwnerEmailWarning
elements.defaultValue: An email is not required. But please supply it if possible as this is the easiest contact method to request all the NSW destinations worked at.

elements.name: OwnerPhone
elements.label: Phone
elements.regexMessage: Must contain any of: digits; spaces; brackets "(", ")"; or a plus "+". Must be a minimum of 8 characters.

elements.name: DescriptionOfCarrierInfo
elements.label: DescriptionOfCarriersInfo
elements.defaultValue:
Only add the carrier(s) - the machinery - being presented together for inspection.

If you make an error, an inspector can edit the details of your carriers. If that happens, the carrier details listed on your Record of Movement will be different from the carrier details listed on the Biosecurity Certificate. The Biosecurity Certificate is the authoritative record of the carrier details.

elements.name: CarrierSerialNumber
elements.label: Serial number
elements.hint: You only need to give us the last 6 characters of the serial number.

elements.name: OriginOfCarriersInfo
elements.label: OriginOfCarriersInfo
elements.defaultValue:
Where the carrier(s) last worked in Queensland.

Where there are multiple carriers this must be one origin for all the carriers. If carriers come from different origins, they must be listed on separate records of movement.

elements.name: OriginCannotFindAddressBySearch
elements.label: I cannot find my address by search

elements.name: OriginManualPostcode
elements.label: Postcode
elements.regexMessage: Must be a physical Queensland postcode. That is, between 4000 and 4999.

elements.name: DestinationsOfCarriersInfo
elements.label: DestinationsOfCarriersInfo
elements.defaultValue: Where there are multiple carriers (listed on the one record of movement), they are not required to travel together to the same NSW destinations. That is, they can work at separate NSW destinations.

elements.name: AreDestinationsKnown
elements.label: Do you know the destinations in NSW where the carriers will next work?

options.label: Yes - I know at least one of the destinations
options.value: Yes - I know at least one of the destinations

options.label: No - all currently unknown, but expected to work in NSW
options.value: No - all currently unknown, but expected to work in NSW

elements.name: KnownAddressNoInfo_copy
elements.label: AreDestinationsKnown_YesInfo
elements.defaultValue:
List the NSW destinations you currently know.

At season's end the owner of the carrier(s) will be contacted and be required to furnish information about all the destinations that the carrier(s) worked in NSW.

elements.name: KnownAddressNoInfo
elements.label: AreDestinationsKnown_NoInfo
elements.defaultValue: At season's end the owner of the carrier(s) will be contacted and be required to furnish information about all the destinations that the carrier(s) worked in NSW.

elements.name: DestinationCannotFindAddressBySearch
elements.label: I cannot find my address by search

elements.name: DestinationManualPostcode
elements.label: Postcode
elements.regexMessage: Must be a physical New South Wales postcode. That is, between 2000 and 2999.

elements.name: RomUserNotes
elements.label: Notes
elements.hint: Anything else you'd like to tell us about.

elements.defaultValue: The inspector {ELEMENT:InspectorFillingRom} represents that ...

elements.name: PaymentRoutesInfo
elements.label: PaymentRoutesInfo

options.label: Pay now by card - certifier filled ROM
options.value: Pay now by card - certifier filled ROM

elements.name: PayNowByCardInfo
elements.label: PayNowByCardInfo
elements.defaultValue: Pay now by card. After clicking [Submit], the person responsible to enter their card details.

elements.name: PayAfterBorderCrossingInfo
elements.label: PayAfterBorderCrossingInfo

elements.name: TaxInvoicePerparationInfo
elements.label: TaxInvoicePerparationInfo
elements.defaultValue:
This tax invoice preparation section appears when:

  • An end user (not a biosecurity certifier) is filling out the form, or
  • A biosecurity certifier is filling out the form and has chosen a Payment route = "Pay now by card".

elements.name: TaxInvoiceTo
elements.label: Tax invoice to
elements.hint: Which person to make out the Tax Invoice to? If responsible person and owner are the same, choose "Owner".

elements.name: PersonResponsibleAbn
elements.label: Person responsible ABN
elements.hint: Optional. Supply your ABN if you'd like it to appear on the Tax Invoice. You can also enter your ACN and we'll look up your ABN (when entering an ACN press tab on your keyboard to run the search). For payments under $1000 it is not required to list your ABN on a tax invoice.

elements.name: OwnerAbn
elements.label: Owner ABN
elements.hint: Optional. Supply your ABN if you'd like it to appear on the Tax Invoice. You can also enter your ACN and we'll look up your ABN (when entering an ACN press tab on your keyboard to run the search). For payments under $1000 it is not required to list your ABN on a tax invoice.
